sentences.english: And how do you deal with lip gloss that can't hold still?
sentences.chinese: 还有，怎么对付那些喝点水就掉的液体唇彩？

sentences.english: My lip gloss has the essential oil orange in it which unquestionably lifts my spirits in an instant.
sentences.chinese: 我用的唇彩就内含橘子精油，可以让我瞬间神采焕发。

sentences.english: You can also apply lipstick or lip gloss.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以使用口红或唇彩。

sentences.english: CoverGirl has these outlast lip stains that I really like — I have about five in my purse.
sentences.chinese: 封面女孩的长效唇彩，我现在包里就有五支呢。

sentences.english: Lip gloss applied over your daytime makeup transforms you into a party girl.
sentences.chinese: 唇彩适用于你的白天化妆，变换你成为一个党的女孩。

sentences.english: NYX Girls Round Lip Gloss is a must have for all sexy girls.
sentences.chinese: NYX圆管唇彩是所有性感女孩的必备之物。

sentences.english: Apply your favorite shade of gloss with your finger or lip brush.
sentences.chinese: 然后用手指或唇刷上唇彩。

sentences.english: Try a more sheer pink gloss, like Clinique's Superbalm Moisturizing Gloss in Raspberry.
sentences.chinese: 尝试更纯粹的粉红色，如倩碧的滋润唇彩。

definition: bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
